text: The women's 100 metres hurdles event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 23, 24 and 25 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Joyce Bates ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Glory Alozie ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Tan Yali ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 25 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
